720016f-a.title: Manhattan: Gold Street - John Street
720016f-a.text:
Gold Street, south from (No. 23, right), a point midway between John
and Platt Streets, aoross the latter to Maiden Lane. The 4-story corner
structure seen on the right and bearing a ''Cafe'' sign is the ''Jack Knife''
Building (No. 19); a triangular structure that is a remmnant of a larger
building, part of which was demolished when Jacob Platt cut Platt Street
through in 1834. Past same, and occupying the S.W. corner is a 4-story
structure (white) No. 15, that has been occupied by Thomas Prosser and
Son since 1845. This firm, the American representatives of the Krupp
Steel Works of Germany will move to 120 Wall Street, according to the
New York Times of December 8, 1937.
About 1910.
Brown Brothers.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720016f-a.folder: Gold Street & John Street, Manhattan, NY

720702f-b.title: Manhattan: John Street - Gold Street
720702f-b.text:
(1)
91 to 101 John Street, (97-101 only partly shown) north side, east from
and including Gold (left), to, but not including Cliff Streets. These houses
were later raned to make room for the 25-story Insurance Company of North
America Building. Also shown is exoavation work in progress (south side of
the Street) on the foundation for the new 28-story office building, No. 90
John Street.
October 13, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A portion of the same, showing No's. 91 and 93 only. Also seen,
prominently, is the 14-story National Underwriters Building, at the N. W.
corner of Gold Street. At the extreme left appears a portion of the 25-
story Insurance Centre Building, at the S. W. corner of the latter Street.
October 13, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
A part of the same, showing No's. 95 and 97-101 completely. No.
97-101 is at the N.W. corner of Cliff Street and bears No's. 1-13 on the
latter Street.
October 13, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720702f-b.folder: John Street & Gold Street, Manhattan, NY

720705f-b.title: Manhattan: John Street - Gold Street
720705f-b.folder: John Street & Gold Street, Manhattan, NY

720705f-a.title: Manhattan: John Street - Gold Street
720705f-a.folder: John Street & Gold Street, Manhattan, NY

720710f-b.title: Manhattan: John Street - Gold Street
720710f-b.text:
(1)
105-104, 102 (5-story house) and 100-90 John Street, west of, adjoining,
and at the S.E. corner of Gold Street. The 28-story building (100-90)
prominently seen is known as No. 90 John Street. Also shtwn (fenced) is
excavation work in progress on the north side of the street, between Cliff
and Gold Streets, where the 25-story Iisurance Co.NNorth Ame2ica Building
was later erected.
May 29, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
1g U2( A
(2)
The same, from a different angle (not showing, however, No's. 106-
102). The 90 John Street Building is seen partially on the extreme left,
with the Iisurance Centre Building at the S.W. corner of Gold Street.
Across the clearance (center of view) is the 14-story National Board of
Underwriters Building, at the N.W. corner of Gold Street.
May 29, 1932.
